Producer: Ed Guiney, Joanna Hogg, Andrew Lowe, Emma Norton, Luke Schiller
Production Co: JWH Films, BBC Films, Element Pictures, BFI Film Fund, Protagonist Pictures
Synopsis: In the aftermath of her tumultuous relationship with a charismatic and manipulative older man, Julie begins to untangle her fraught love for him in making her graduation film, sorting fact from his elaborately constructed fiction.
Title: The Souvenir Part II
